data.name: Suburban Roofing, Inc.
data.address: 2717 Mc Dearmon St Suite B, Sachse, TX 75048

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Now, that is an honest roofer!" "I would not recommend this roofing company to anyone."

Seems to be a roofing company established by dad and now run by unmotivated son. Dad more interested in running his cigar shop rather than helping run the roofing business.  Chris (son) full of excuses for delaying everything. Jeff (dad) … More Response from the owner 5 years ago It's sad to get a bad review from anyone. Unfortunately, when the customer has to many ways of trying to get the insurance … More

We had Chris come out and check our roof to see what kind of shape it was in.He told us that the roof did not have any visible damage and did not need to be replaced. … More Response from the owner 6 years ago Thank you for the opportunity to serve you sir
